title: Promise Me
description: After a tragic accident leaves Raelynn Cleaver reliving the foggy memories of her worst nightmare, she finds herself discovering truths deep down she never would have admitted to herself.She finds out truths regarding Clintâ€™s life she cannot accept.And as she battles between her friends, her mother, and the boy who has her heart, she finds herself caught up in a battle for his life.For his future.For his soul.Against an opponent no boy should ever have to face.
author: Rebel Hart
